name: 林家弘
objective:
本課程主要是讓同學學習智慧顯示與感測相關的理論與瞭解相關產業動向，除了透過相關產業導師的教導與實地工廠的參訪，讓同學在最短的時間內對台灣智慧顯示與感測有初步的認識，此外，本課程也包含各種發光元件的實作與其相關光電特性的量測與應用，讓同學能將理論與實務合而為一。


The main goal of this course is to teach students the theories and related industrial trends of intelligent displays and sensors. This will be achieved through lectures by industry experts and visits to factories, allowing students to gain a basic understanding of the relevant industries in Taiwan within a short period of time. The course will also include hands-on projects focusing on various LCD components and related optoelectronic properties measurement and application. By combining theory and practice, students can gain a comprehensive understanding of intelligent displays and sensors.

第六週    實驗 3 鈣鈦礦量子點薄膜螢光光譜與生命期量測 
第七週    實驗 4 LED 色域量測
第八週    期中報告
第九週    期中考週

第十五週  業師授課 (Micro LED)
第十六週  業師授課 (車用 LED)
第十七週  期末報告
第十八週  期末考週

參考書目 
1. Jiun-Haw Lee, David N. Liu, and Shin-Tson Wu, "Introduction to Flat Panel Displays", John Wiley & Sons, 2008. 
2. Lawrence Tannas, “Flat-Panel Display and CRTs”, Van Nostrand Reinhold, 1985. 
3. S. Miyata and H. S. Nalwa, “ Organic Electroluminescent materials and devices”, Gordon and Breach, 1997. 
4. Pochi Yeh and Claire Gu, “Optics of liquid crystal displays”, John Wiley & Sons, 1999.
